1232960.name: Treasure Hunt - Editor
1232960.description: Plan an unforgettable birthday party or game day with our innovative treasure hunt app! Perfect for parents who want to host an exciting and interactive celebration for children ages 6-12. Our app turns your PC into a magical tool for an exhilarating treasure hunt. Combine the search for waypoints or classic puzzles with quiz questions. In the course of the story, participants are guided through a fascinating world where they must answer intriguing questions. These questions are asked by magical mythical creatures. The highlight of the treasure hunt is, of course, the treasure itself – a sweet reward for successfully answering all the questions. Make your child's birthday an unforgettable experience with our treasure hunt app!
1232960.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
